quest.strDescription: Guardian Trainer Eckhard has instructed you to visit Cysero, the Mad Weaponsmith, to completely repair your armor. Luckily, he's settled down in Falconreach with his new Superstore of Savings!
quest.strComplete: Amazing, the guardian armor that you brought to Cysero looks as good as new. Every chink, dent, and scratch has vanished!
